BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon President Donald Trump to fully fund the Corporation for Public Broadcasting, the Institute of Museum and Library Services, the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Endowment for the Humanities, and not to eliminate or diminish any of these agencies in any form.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Calling upon President Trump to fully fund the Corporation for Public Broadcasting, the Institute of Museum and Library Services, the National Endowment for the Arts & the National Endowment for the Humanities.
